title: Software Design Student
info: Contributed to software development and testing processes, including manual and automated regression testing. Worked with technologies like C#, and JavaScript in Visual Studio. Collaborated with team members to debug, write unit tests, and maintain high code quality. Gained experience with tools such as Azure while supporting cloud-based services and helping resolve user issues.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
info: Studied and implemented fundamental data structures such as binary trees, graphs, stacks, and queues. Gained proficiency in searching and sorting algorithms and memory management techniques.

title: HTML & CSS
info: Completed a course covering foundational and advanced topics in web design, creating responsive and visually engaging web pages.

title: JavaScript
info: Gained expertise in JavaScript fundamentals and advanced techniques for building dynamic and interactive web applications. Applied knowledge to create powerful and user-friendly websites.

title: Git and Github
info: Gained a basis in git and github properties like branching, merging, pushing, etc.

title: Object Oriented Programming
info: Buit foundational knowledge in Object-Oriented programming learning components such as polymorphism, inheritance, overloading and encapsulation.

title: Database Managament Systems
info: This course explores database fundamentals, including design, data manipulation, and DBMS usage, building practical skills for managing structured data.
